<main class="flex-1 max-w-4xl px-4 sm:px-8 py-12 lg:px-12 transition-[max-width] duration-300 ease-in-out"><header class="mb-12"><h1 class="text-3xl sm:text-4xl lg:text-5xl font-bold text-foreground mb-4">API Reference</h1><p class="text-lg sm:text-xl text-default-600">A detailed overview of the SoundFlow API, including namespaces, classes, interfaces, and their members.</p></header><div><h1 id="api-reference" class="text-4xl font-bold text-foreground mb-8 mt-12 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">API Reference</h1>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base">This section provides a detailed overview of the SoundFlow API, including namespaces, classes, interfaces, and their members. It serves as a comprehensive reference for developers working with the SoundFlow library.</p>
<h2 id="namespaces" class="text-3xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-6 mt-10 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24 border-b border-divider pb-3">Namespaces</h2>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base">SoundFlow is organized into the following namespaces:</p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Abstracts</code>:</strong> Contains abstract classes and interfaces that define the core framework of SoundFlow. This includes base classes for the audio engine, audio devices, sound components, modifiers, and analyzers.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Backends</code>:</strong> Provides backend-specific implementations for audio input/output. The primary backend currently supported is <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Backends.MiniAudio</code>, which uses the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">miniaudio</code> library.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Components</code>:</strong> Contains concrete <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundComponent</code> classes that provide various audio processing functionalities, including playback, mixing, synthesis, and analysis. It also includes standalone components like the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Recorder</code>.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Editing</code>:</strong> Contains classes for non-destructive audio editing, including <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Composition</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Track</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioSegment</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioSegmentSettings</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">LoopSettings</code>, and <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">FadeCurveType</code>.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Editing.Persistence</code>:</strong> Contains classes for saving and loading audio compositions, such as <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CompositionProjectManager</code> and various project data DTOs.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Enums</code>:</strong> Contains enumerations used throughout the SoundFlow library to represent different states, options, and capabilities.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Exceptions</code>:</strong> Contains custom exception classes used for error handling within SoundFlow.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Interfaces</code>:</strong> Contains interfaces that define contracts for various functionalities, such as audio data providers, encoders, decoders, and visualizers.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Modifiers</code>:</strong> Contains concrete <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundModifier</code> classes that implement various audio effects.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Providers</code>:</strong> Contains classes that implement the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundDataProvider</code> interface, providing ways to load audio data from different sources.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Structs</code>:</strong> Contains custom struct types used within SoundFlow, often for interop or specific data representation.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Utils</code>:</strong> Contains utility classes and extension methods that provide helpful functionalities for working with audio data and performing common operations.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Visualization</code>:</strong> Contains classes related to audio visualization, including analyzers and visualizers.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Extensions</code>:</strong> Namespace for official extensions.
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Extensions.WebRtc.Apm</code>:</strong> Provides integration with the WebRTC Audio Processing Module for features like echo cancellation, noise suppression, and automatic gain control.
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Extensions.WebRtc.Apm.Components</code>:</strong> Contains components utilizing the WebRTC APM, like <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoiseSuppressor</code>.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Extensions.WebRtc.Apm.Modifiers</code>:</strong> Contains modifiers utilizing the WebRTC APM, like <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">WebRtcApmModifier</code>.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<h2 id="key-classes-and-interfaces" class="text-3xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-6 mt-10 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24 border-b border-divider pb-3">Key Classes and Interfaces</h2>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base">Below is a summary of the key classes and interfaces in SoundFlow.</p>
<h3 id="abstracts" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Abstracts</h3>
<table><thead><tr><th>Class/Interface</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#abstracts-audioanalyzer" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioAnalyzer</code></a></td><td>Abstract base class for audio analysis components. Inherits from <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundComponent</code>.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#abstracts-audioengine" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioEngine</code></a></td><td>Abstract base class for an audio engine. Manages audio device lifecycle, provides encoding/decoding, and is the root context.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#abstracts-audiodevice" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioDevice</code></a></td><td>Abstract base class for an initialized audio device (playback or capture).</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#abstracts-audioplaybackdevice" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioPlaybackDevice</code></a></td><td>Abstract class representing an initialized output/playback device. Contains a <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MasterMixer</code>.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#abstracts-audiocapturedevice" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioCaptureDevice</code></a></td><td>Abstract class representing an initialized input/capture device. Exposes an <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">OnAudioProcessed</code> event.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#abstracts-fullduplexdevice" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">FullDuplexDevice</code></a></td><td>A high-level abstraction managing a paired playback and capture device for simultaneous I/O.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#abstracts-deviceconfig" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DeviceConfig</code></a></td><td>Abstract base class for backend-specific device configuration objects.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#abstracts-soundcomponent" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundComponent</code></a></td><td>Abstract base class for all audio processing units in SoundFlow. Represents a node in the audio graph.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#abstracts-soundmodifier" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundModifier</code></a></td><td>Abstract base class for audio effects that modify audio samples.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#abstracts-soundplayerbase" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundPlayerBase</code></a></td><td>Abstract base class providing common functionality for sound playback components. Inherits from <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundComponent</code> and implements <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundPlayer</code>. Includes support for time-stretching.</td></tr></tbody></table>
<h3 id="backends-miniaudio" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Backends.MiniAudio</h3>
<table><thead><tr><th>Class/Interface</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none text-sm">MiniAudioEngine</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioEngine</code> implementation that uses the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">miniaudio</code> library for audio I/O.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MiniAudioDeviceConfig</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DeviceConfig</code> implementation for MiniAudio, providing detailed, backend-specific settings for WASAPI, CoreAudio, ALSA, etc.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MiniAudioDecoder</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundDecoder</code> implementation using the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">miniaudio</code> library.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#backendsminiaudio-miniaudiodecoder" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MiniAudioEncoder</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundEncoder</code> implementation using the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">miniaudio</code> library.</td></tr></tbody></table>
<h3 id="components" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Components</h3>
<table><thead><tr><th>Class/Interface</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#components-envelopegenerator" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EnvelopeGenerator</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundComponent</code> that generates an ADSR (Attack, Decay, Sustain, Release) envelope signal.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#components-filter" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Filter</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundComponent</code> that applies a digital filter (low-pass, high-pass, band-pass, notch) to the audio signal.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#components-lowfrequencyoscillator" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">LowFrequencyOscillator</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundComponent</code> that generates a low-frequency oscillator (LFO) signal with various waveforms.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#components-mixer" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Mixer</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundComponent</code> that mixes multiple audio streams together. The <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Mixer.Master</code> property provides access to the default root mixer.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#components-oscillator" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Oscillator</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundComponent</code> that generates various waveforms (sine, square, sawtooth, triangle, noise, pulse).</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#components-recorder" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Recorder</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundComponent</code> that captures audio input from a recording device and allows saving it to a stream or processing it via a callback.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#components-soundplayer" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundPlayer</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundPlayerBase</code> implementation that plays audio from an <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundDataProvider</code>.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#components-surroundplayer" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SurroundPlayer</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundPlayerBase</code> implementation that extends <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundPlayer</code> to support surround sound configurations with customizable speaker positions, delays, and panning methods.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#components-voiceactivitydetector" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">VoiceActivityDetector</code></a></td><td>An <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioAnalyzer</code> that detects human voice in an audio stream, featuring configurable activation and hangover times to prevent rapid state changes.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#components-wsolatimestretcher" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">WsolaTimeStretcher</code></a></td><td>Implements WSOLA algorithm for real-time, pitch-preserved time stretching. Used internally by <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioSegment</code>.</td></tr></tbody></table>
<h3 id="editing" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Editing</h3>
<table><thead><tr><th>Class/Interface</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#editing-composition" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Composition</code></a></td><td>Top-level container for audio tracks, representing a complete project. Implements <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundDataProvider</code> for rendering. <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IDisposable</code>.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Track</code></a></td><td>Represents a single audio track within a <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Composition</code>, containing <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Track</code>'s timeline, referencing a portion of an audio source and applying playback settings. <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IDisposable</code>.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioSegmentSettings</code></a></td><td>Configurable settings for an <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioSegment</code> (volume, pan, fades, loop, reverse, speed, time stretch, modifiers, whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Track</code> (volume, pan, mute, solo, enabled, modifiers, analyzers).</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioSegment</code> (repetitions, target duration).</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">FadeCurveType</code></a></td><td>(enum) Defines curve types for fade effects (Linear, Logarithmic, SCurve).</td></tr></tbody></table>

<h3 id="enums" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Enums</h3>

text-sm">SampleFormat</code></a></td><td>Specifies the format of audio samples (e.g., U8, S16, S24, S32, F32).</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent <h3 id="exceptions" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Exceptions</h3>
<table><thead><tr><th>Class</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#exceptions-backendexception" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">BackendException</code></a></td><td>Thrown when an error occurs in a specific audio backend.</td></tr></tbody></table>

<table><thead><tr><th>Class/Interface</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none <h3 id="interfaces" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Interfaces</h3>

<h3 id="modifiers" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Modifiers</h3>
<table><thead><tr><th>Class</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#modifiers-algorithmicreverbmodifier" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AlgorithmicReverbModifier</code></a></td><td>Simulates reverberation using a network of comb and all-pass filters. Now supports multi-channel processing.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#modifiers-bassboostmodifier" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">BassBoosterModifier</code></a></td><td>Enhances low-frequency content using a resonant low-pass filter.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#modifiers-chorusmodifier" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ChorusModifier</code></a></td><td>Creates a chorus effect by mixing delayed and modulated copies of the signal.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#modifiers-compressormodifier" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CompressorModifier</code></a></td><td>Reduces the dynamic range of the audio signal using a compressor algorithm.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#modifiers-delaymodifier" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DelayModifier</code></a></td><td>Applies a delay effect with feedback and optional low-pass filtering of the delayed signal.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#modifiers-frequencybandmodifier" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">FrequencyBandModifier</code></a></td><td>Allows boosting or cutting specific frequency bands using a combination of low-pass and high-pass filters.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#modifiers-parametricequalizer" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ParametricEqualizer</code></a></td><td>Provides precise control over the frequency spectrum with multiple configurable bands, each of which can be set as a peaking, low-shelf, high-shelf, band-pass, notch, low-pass, or high-pass filter.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#modifiers-multichannelchorusmodifier" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MultiChannelChorusModifier</code></a></td><td>Creates a chorus effect with independent processing for each channel, allowing for rich spatial effects.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#modifiers-trebleboostmodifier" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">TrebleBoostModifier</code></a></td><td>Enhances high-frequency content using a high-pass filter.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#extensions-webrtc-apm-modifiers-webrtcapmmodifier" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">WebRtcApmModifier</code></a> (from <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundFlow.Extensions.WebRtc.Apm.Modifiers</code>)</td><td>Applies WebRTC APM features like echo cancellation, noise suppression, and AGC in real-time.</td></tr></tbody></table>
<h3 id="providers" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Providers</h3>
<table><thead><tr><th>Class</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#providers-assetdataprovider" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AssetDataProvider</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundDataProvider</code> implementation that reads audio data from a byte array (useful for in-memory assets). Implements <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IDisposable</code>.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#providers-streamdataprovider" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">StreamDataProvider</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundDataProvider</code> that reads audio data from a generic <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Stream</code> on-demand (supports seeking if the stream is seekable). Implements <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IDisposable</code>.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#providers-microphonedataprovider" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MicrophoneDataProvider</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundDataProvider</code> that captures and provides audio data from an <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioCaptureDevice</code> in real-time. Implements <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IDisposable</code>.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#providers-chunkeddataprovider" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ChunkedDataProvider</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundDataProvider</code> that reads and decodes audio data from a file or stream in chunks, improving efficiency for large files. Implements <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IDisposable</code>.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#providers-networkdataprovider" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NetworkDataProvider</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundDataProvider</code> that provides audio data from a network source (direct URL or HLS playlist). Implements <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IDisposable</code>.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#providers-queuedataprovider" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">QueueDataProvider</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundDataProvider</code> fed by an external source in real-time, ideal for generated or procedural audio. Implements <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IDisposable</code>.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#providers-rawdataprovider" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">RawDataProvider</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundDataProvider</code> for reading raw PCM audio data from a stream or byte/float/int/short array. Implements <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IDisposable</code>.</td></tr></tbody></table>
<h3 id="structs" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Structs</h3>
<table><thead><tr><th>Struct</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#structs-audioformat" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioFormat</code></a></td><td>(record struct) Represents the format of an audio stream (sample format, channels, sample rate).</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DeviceInfo</code></a></td><td>Represents information about an audio device, including ID, name, and supported formats.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#structs-nativedataformat" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NativeDataFormat</code></a></td><td>Represents a native data format supported by an audio device (format, channels, sample rate).</td></tr></tbody></table>
<h3 id="utils" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Utils</h3>
<table><thead><tr><th>Class</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#utils-extensions" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Extensions</code></a></td><td>Provides extension methods for working with audio data and other utility functions, including <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ReadArray&lt;T&gt;</code> for reading structures from native memory.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#utils-mathhelper" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MathHelper</code></a></td><td>Provides mathematical functions and algorithms used in audio processing, including optimized FFT, window functions, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Mod</code>, and <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PrincipalAngle</code>.</td></tr></tbody></table>
<h3 id="visualization" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Visualization</h3>
<table><thead><tr><th>Class/Interface</th><th>Description</th></tr></thead><tbody><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none text-sm">LevelMeterVisualizer</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IVisualizer</code> that displays a level meter showing the current RMS or peak level of the audio.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent text-sm">SpectrumAnalyzer</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioAnalyzer</code> that computes the frequency spectrum of the audio using the Fast Fourier Transform (FFT).</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#visualization-spectrumvisualizer" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SpectrumVisualizer</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IVisualizer</code> that renders a bar graph representing the frequency spectrum of the audio.</td></tr><tr><td><a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="#visualization-waveformvisualizer" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">WaveformVisualizer</code></a></td><td><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IVisualizer</code> that draws the waveform of the audio signal.</td></tr></tbody></table>
<h2 id="detailed-class-and-interface-documentation" class="text-3xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-6 mt-10 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24 border-b border-divider pb-3">Detailed Class and Interface Documentation</h2>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base">This section provides more in-depth information about some of the key classes and interfaces.</p>
<h3 id="abstracts-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Abstracts <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioAnalyzer</code></h3>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><div class="flex items-center justify-between px-4 py-3 rounded-t-xl border-b border-slate-300/70 bg-slate-100/70 dark:border-b-white/5 dark:bg-black/20"><div class="flex items-center gap-4"><span class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">Csharp</span></div><div class="flex items-center gap-2"><button class="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-1.5 rounded-md transition-all duration-300 text-gray-600 bg-black/5 hover:bg-blue-500/10 hover:text-blue-700 hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-blue-500/10 dark:text-gray-300 dark:bg-white/5 dark:hover:bg-purple-500/20 dark:hover:text-white dark:hover:shadow-lg dark:hover:shadow-purple-500/20" aria-label="Copy code"><span style="opacity: 1; <p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Name</code>: The name of the analyzer.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Enabled</code>: Gets or sets whether the analyzer is active. If false, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Analyze</code> is skipped.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Format</code>: The audio format the analyzer is configured to process.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Process(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer, int channels)</code>: Processes the audio data, calling <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Analyze</code> and then sending data to the attached visualizer.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Analyze(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer, int channels)</code>: Abstract method to be implemented by derived classes to perform audio analysis on the provided buffer.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="abstracts-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Abstracts <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioEngine</code></h3>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PlaybackDevices</code>: An array of available playback devices.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CaptureDevices</code>: An array of available capture devices.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IsDisposed</code>: Indicates whether the engine has been disposed.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoloComponent(SoundComponent component)</code>: Solos a specific component, muting all others.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">UnsoloComponent(SoundComponent component)</code>: Removes the solo status from a component.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">GetSoloedComponent()</code>: Returns the currently soloed component, if any.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CreateEncoder(...)</code>: Creates a backend-specific sound encoder.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CreateDecoder(...)</code>: Creates a backend-specific sound decoder.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">InitializePlaybackDevice(...)</code>: Initializes and returns a new playback device.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">InitializeCaptureDevice(...)</code>: Initializes and returns a new capture device.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">InitializeFullDuplexDevice(...)</code>: Initializes a high-level full-duplex device for simultaneous I/O.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">InitializeLoopbackDevice(...)</code>: Initializes a device for loopback recording of system audio.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SwitchDevice(...)</code>: Switches an active device to a new physical device, preserving its state (components or subscribers).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">UpdateDevicesInfo()</code>: Refreshes the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PlaybackDevices</code> and <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CaptureDevices</code> lists.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Disposes the engine and all associated resources.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="abstracts-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Abstracts <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioDevice</code></h3>

</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">abstract</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Start</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
