</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> An abstract base class representing an initialized audio device, which is managed by an <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioEngine</code>. This class encapsulates the common state and behavior for both playback and capture devices, serving as the foundation for all device interactions within the framework.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Engine</code>: Gets the parent <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioEngine</code> that manages this device instance.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Info</code>: Gets the informational struct (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DeviceInfo</code>) for the physical device being used. This contains details like the device name and ID. <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">null</code> if a default device was used without specific info.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Config</code>: Gets the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DeviceConfig</code> object used to initialize the device. This holds any backend-specific configuration settings.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Capability</code>: Gets the capability of this device (e.g., <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Playback</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Record</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Loopback</code>).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Format</code>: Gets the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioFormat</code> (sample rate, channels, bit depth) that the device was initialized with.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IsRunning</code>: Gets a value indicating whether the device is currently started and processing audio.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IsDisposed</code>: Gets a value indicating whether this device instance has been disposed and can no longer be used.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">OnDisposed</code>: This event is raised when the device's <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code> method is called, signaling that it is being shut down and its resources are being released.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Start()</code>: Abstract method that must be implemented by derived classes to start the audio stream for the device.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Stop()</code>: Abstract method that must be implemented by derived classes to stop the audio stream for the device.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Abstract method to release all resources used by the audio device.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="abstracts-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Abstracts <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioPlaybackDevice</code></h3>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><div class="flex items-center justify-between px-4 py-3 rounded-t-xl border-b border-slate-300/70 bg-slate-100/70 dark:border-b-white/5 dark:bg-black/20"><div class="flex items-center gap-4"><span class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">Csharp</span></div><div class="flex items-center gap-2"><button class="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-1.5 rounded-md transition-all duration-300 text-gray-600 bg-black/5 hover:bg-blue-500/10 hover:text-blue-700 hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-blue-500/10 dark:text-gray-300 dark:bg-white/5 dark:hover:bg-purple-500/20 dark:hover:text-white dark:hover:shadow-lg dark:hover:shadow-purple-500/20" aria-label="Copy code"><span style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" aria-hidden="true" role="img" class="iconify iconify--heroicons w-4 h-4" width="1em" height="1em" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M15.666 3.888A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 13.5 2.25h-3c-1.03 0-1.9.693-2.166 1.638m7.332 0q.083.292.084.612v0a.75.75 0 0 1-.75.75H9a.75.75 0 0 1-.75-.75v0q.002-.32.084-.612m7.332 0q.969.073 1.927.184c1.1.128 1.907 1.077 1.907 2.185V19.5a2.25 2.25 0 0 1-2.25 2.25H6.75A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 4.5 19.5V6.257c0-1.108.806-2.057 1.907-2.185a48 48 0 0 1 1.927-.184"></path></svg></span><span class="text-xs">Copy</span></button></div></div><div class="text-left scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-slate-400 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 scrollbar-track-transparent"><pre style="background: transparent; color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, &quot;Fira Code&quot;, monospace; direction: ltr; text-align: left; white-space: pre-wrap; word-spacing: normal; word-break: break-word; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 2; hyphens: none; padding: 1.5rem; margin: 0px; overflow: initial; border-radius: 0.3em; font-size: 14px; text-shadow: none;"><code><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">abstract</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">class</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioPlaybackDevice</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">:</span><span> </span><span class="token type-list" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioDevice</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">Mixer</span><span> MasterMixer </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> An abstract class that represents an initialized playback (output) audio device. It inherits from <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioDevice</code> and extends it with functionality specific to audio output.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MasterMixer</code>: Gets the master <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Mixer</code> for this device. All audio to be played on this device must be routed through this mixer. You can connect various <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundComponent</code>s (like <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundPlayer</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Oscillator</code>, or other <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Mixer</code>s) to this master mixer to combine them into a final output signal.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="abstracts-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Abstracts <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioCaptureDevice</code></h3>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" aria-hidden="true" role="img" class="iconify iconify--heroicons w-4 h-4" width="1em" height="1em" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M15.666 3.888A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 13.5 2.25h-3c-1.03 0-1.9.693-2.166 1.638m7.332 0q.083.292.084.612v0a.75.75 0 0 1-.75.75H9a.75.75 0 0 1-.75-.75v0q.002-.32.084-.612m7.332 0q.969.073 1.927.184c1.1.128 1.907 1.077 1.907 2.185V19.5a2.25 2.25 0 0 1-2.25 2.25H6.75A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 4.5 19.5V6.257c0-1.108.806-2.057 1.907-2.185a48 48 0 0 1 1.927-.184"></path></svg></span><span class="text-xs">Copy</span></button></div></div><div class="text-left scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-slate-400 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 scrollbar-track-transparent"><pre style="background: transparent; color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, &quot;Fira Code&quot;, monospace; direction: ltr; text-align: left; white-space: pre-wrap; word-spacing: normal; word-break: break-word; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 2; hyphens: none; padding: 1.5rem; margin: 0px; overflow: initial; border-radius: 0.3em; font-size: 14px; text-shadow: none;"><code><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">abstract</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">class</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioCaptureDevice</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">:</span><span> </span><span class="token type-list" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioDevice</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">event</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioProcessCallback</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> OnAudioProcessed</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">internal</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">Delegate</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">[</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">]</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">GetEventSubscribers</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> An abstract class that represents an initialized capture (input) audio device. It inherits from <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioDevice</code> and provides the core mechanism for receiving audio data from an input source like a microphone.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">OnAudioProcessed</code>: This event is the primary way to receive audio data from the capture device. It is raised by the backend whenever a new chunk of audio samples has been captured. Subscribe to this event to process live audio input. The event delegate is <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioProcessCallback(Span&lt;float&gt; samples, Capability capability)</code>.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">GetEventSubscribers()</code>: (Internal) An internal method used by the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioEngine</code> to retrieve the list of subscribers to the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">OnAudioProcessed</code> event. This is crucial for the device switching functionality, allowing event subscriptions to be preserved when moving from one physical device to another.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="abstracts-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Abstracts <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">FullDuplexDevice</code></h3>

</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">event</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioProcessCallback</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> OnAudioProcessed</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>

</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">override</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Stop</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">override</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Dispose</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> A high-level, sealed class that simplifies full-duplex (simultaneous input and output) audio operations. It internally manages a paired <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioPlaybackDevice</code> and <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioCaptureDevice</code>, making it ideal for applications like live effects processing, VoIP, or real-time instrument monitoring where you need to listen to an input while producing an output.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PlaybackDevice</code>: Gets the underlying <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioPlaybackDevice</code> instance used for audio output.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CaptureDevice</code>: Gets the underlying <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioCaptureDevice</code> instance used for audio input.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MasterMixer</code>: A convenient shortcut to access the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MasterMixer</code> of the underlying <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PlaybackDevice</code>. This is where you should route all audio you want to play out.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">OnAudioProcessed</code>: An event that is raised when audio data is captured from the input device. This event is a direct pass-through to the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">OnAudioProcessed</code> event of the underlying <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CaptureDevice</code>.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Start()</code>: Starts both the underlying capture and playback devices simultaneously.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Stop()</code>: Stops both the underlying capture and playback devices simultaneously.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Stops and disposes of all resources, including the underlying <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PlaybackDevice</code> and <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CaptureDevice</code>.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="abstracts-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Abstracts <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DeviceConfig</code></h3>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><div class="flex items-center justify-between px-4 py-3 rounded-t-xl border-b border-slate-300/70 bg-slate-100/70 dark:border-b-white/5 dark:bg-black/20"><div class="flex items-center gap-4"><span class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">Csharp</span></div><div class="flex items-center gap-2"><button class="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-1.5 rounded-md transition-all duration-300 text-gray-600 bg-black/5 hover:bg-blue-500/10 hover:text-blue-700 hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-blue-500/10 dark:text-gray-300 dark:bg-white/5 dark:hover:bg-purple-500/20 dark:hover:text-white dark:hover:shadow-lg dark:hover:shadow-purple-500/20" aria-label="Copy code"><span style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" aria-hidden="true" role="img" class="iconify iconify--heroicons w-4 h-4" width="1em" height="1em" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M15.666 3.888A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 13.5 2.25h-3c-1.03 0-1.9.693-2.166 1.638m7.332 0q.083.292.084.612v0a.75.75 0 0 1-.75.75H9a.75.75 0 0 1-.75-.75v0q.002-.32.084-.612m7.332 0q.969.073 1.927.184c1.1.128 1.907 1.077 1.907 2.185V19.5a2.25 2.25 0 0 1-2.25 2.25H6.75A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 4.5 19.5V6.257c0-1.108.806-2.057 1.907-2.185a48 48 0 0 1 1.927-.184"></path></svg></span><span class="text-xs">Copy</span></button></div></div><div class="text-left scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-slate-400 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 scrollbar-track-transparent"><pre style="background: transparent; color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, &quot;Fira Code&quot;, monospace; direction: ltr; text-align: left; white-space: pre-wrap; word-spacing: normal; word-break: break-word; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 2; hyphens: none; padding: 1.5rem; margin: 0px; overflow: initial; border-radius: 0.3em; font-size: 14px; text-shadow: none;"><code><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">abstract</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">class</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">DeviceConfig</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> A marker base class for creating backend-specific device configuration objects. This allows passing detailed, implementation-specific settings during device initialization. See <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MiniAudioDeviceConfig</code> for an example.</p>
<h3 id="abstracts-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Abstracts <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundComponent</code></h3>

</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">IReadOnlyList</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">SoundComponent</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span> Inputs </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>

</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">IReadOnlyList</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioAnalyzer</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span> Analyzers </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">ConnectInput</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">SoundComponent</span><span> input</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">DisconnectInput</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">SoundComponent</span><span> input</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">AddModifier</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">SoundModifier</span><span> modifier</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">RemoveModifier</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">SoundModifier</span><span> modifier</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Engine</code>: The engine context this component belongs to.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Format</code>: The audio format of this component.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Name</code>: The name of the component.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Parent</code>: The parent mixer of this component.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Inputs</code>: Read-only list of connected input components.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Modifiers</code>: Read-only list of applied modifiers.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Analyzers</code>: Read-only list of attached audio analyzers.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Volume</code>: The volume of the component's output.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Pan</code>: The panning of the component's output (0.0 for full left, 0.5 for center, 1.0 for full right).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Enabled</code>: Whether the component is enabled.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Solo</code>: Whether the component is soloed.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Mute</code>: Whether the component is muted.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IsDisposed</code>: Indicates whether the component has been disposed.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ConnectInput(SoundComponent input)</code>: Connects another component's output to this component's input.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DisconnectInput(SoundComponent input)</code>: Disconnects an input from this component.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AddModifier(SoundModifier modifier)</code>: Adds a sound modifier to the component.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">RemoveModifier(SoundModifier modifier)</code>: Removes a sound modifier from the component.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AddAnalyzer(AudioAnalyzer analyzer)</code>: Adds an audio analyzer to the component.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">RemoveAnalyzer(AudioAnalyzer analyzer)</code>: Removes an audio analyzer from the component.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Process(Span&lt;float&gt; outputBuffer, int channels)</code>: Processes the component's audio, applying modifiers and handling input/output connections.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">GenerateAudio(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer, int channels)</code>: Abstract method that derived classes must implement to generate or modify audio data.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Disposes the component and disconnects it from the audio graph.</li>
</ul>

<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Enabled</code>: Gets or sets whether the modifier is active and should process audio. Defaults to true.</li>

<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Process(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer)</code>: Processes a buffer of audio data. Applies <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProcessSample</code> to each sample if not overridden.</li>
</ul>

</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">PlaybackState</span><span> State </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">private</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> IsLooping </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> Time </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> Duration </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> LoopStartSamples </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> LoopEndSamples </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> LoopStartSeconds </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> LoopEndSeconds </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(160, 161, 167); font-style: italic;">// Volume is inherited from SoundComponent</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">event</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">EventHandler</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">EventArgs</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> PlaybackEnded</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">protected</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">override</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">GenerateAudio</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">Span</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span> output</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> channels</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">protected</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">virtual</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">HandleEndOfStream</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">Span</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span> remainingOutputBuffer</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> channels</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">protected</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">virtual</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">OnPlaybackEnded</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Play</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Pause</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Stop</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Seek</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">TimeSpan</span><span> time</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">SeekOrigin</span><span> seekOrigin </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">=</span><span> SeekOrigin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">.</span><span>Begin</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Seek</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> time</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Seek</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> sampleOffset</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">SetLoopPoints</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> startTime</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> endTime </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">-</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">1f</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">SetLoopPoints</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> startSample</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> endSample </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">-</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">1</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">SetLoopPoints</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">TimeSpan</span><span> startTime</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">TimeSpan</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> endTime </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">null</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Dispose</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PlaybackSpeed</code>: Gets or sets the playback speed (1.0 is normal). Values other than 1.0 use a WSOLA time stretcher for pitch preservation.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">State</code>: Gets the current playback state (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Stopped</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Playing</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Paused</code>).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IsLooping</code>: Gets or sets whether looping is enabled.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Time</code>: Gets the current playback position in seconds, affected by <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PlaybackSpeed</code>.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Duration</code>: Gets the total duration of the audio in seconds.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">LoopStartSamples</code>: Gets the loop start point in samples.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">LoopEndSamples</code>: Gets the loop end point in samples (-1 for end of audio).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">LoopStartSeconds</code>: Gets the loop start point in seconds.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">LoopEndSeconds</code>: Gets the loop end point in seconds (-1 for end of audio).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Volume</code>: (Inherited from <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundComponent</code>) Gets or sets the volume of the player.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PlaybackEnded</code>: Occurs when playback reaches the end of the audio (not raised during looping).</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">GenerateAudio(Span&lt;float&gt; output)</code>: (Protected Override) Core audio generation logic, handles reading from data provider, resampling for playback speed, and looping.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">HandleEndOfStream(Span&lt;float&gt; remainingOutputBuffer)</code>: (Protected Virtual) Handles logic when the data provider reaches its end (looping or stopping).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">OnPlaybackEnded()</code>: (Protected Virtual) Invokes the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PlaybackEnded</code> event.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Play()</code>: Starts or resumes playback.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Pause()</code>: Pauses playback.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Stop()</code>: Stops playback and resets the position to the beginning.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(TimeSpan time, SeekOrigin seekOrigin = SeekOrigin.Begin)</code>: Seeks to a specific time using <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">TimeSpan</code>. Returns <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code> if successful.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(float time)</code>: Seeks to a specific time in seconds. Returns <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code> if successful.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(int sampleOffset)</code>: Seeks to a specific sample offset. Returns <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code> if successful.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SetLoopPoints(float startTime, float? endTime = -1f)</code>: Configures loop points using start/end times in seconds.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SetLoopPoints(int startSample, int endSample = -1)</code>: Configures loop points using start/end sample indices.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SetLoopPoints(TimeSpan startTime, TimeSpan? endTime = null)</code>: Configures loop points using <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">TimeSpan</code>.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Disposes the player and its underlying data provider.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="abstracts-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Abstracts <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">WsolaTimeStretcher</code></h3>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; </span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Implements the WSOLA (Waveform Similarity Overlap-Add) algorithm for real-time, pitch-preserved time stretching of audio. Allows changing playback speed without altering pitch. Used internally by <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundPlayerBase</code> and <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioSegment</code>.</p>
<h3 id="backends-miniaudio-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Backends.MiniAudio <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MiniAudioDecoder</code></h3>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IsDisposed</code>: Indicates whether the decoder has been disposed.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Length</code>: The total length of the decoded audio data in samples. <em>Note: Can be updated after initial checks if the stream length was not immediately available.</em></li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleFormat</code>: The sample format of the decoded audio data.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EndOfStreamReached</code>: Occurs when the end of the audio stream is reached during decoding.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Decode(Span&lt;float&gt; samples)</code>: Decodes a portion of the audio stream into the provided buffer. Internally synchronized.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Releases the resources used by the decoder.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(int offset)</code>: Seeks to the specified offset within the audio stream (in samples). Internally synchronized.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="backends-miniaudio-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Backends.MiniAudio <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MiniAudioEncoder</code></h3>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" aria-hidden="true" role="img" class="iconify iconify--heroicons w-4 h-4" width="1em" height="1em" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M15.666 3.888A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 13.5 2.25h-3c-1.03 0-1.9.693-2.166 1.638m7.332 0q.083.292.084.612v0a.75.75 0 0 1-.75.75H9a.75.75 0 0 1-.75-.75v0q.002-.32.084-.612m7.332 0q.969.073 1.927.184c1.1.128 1.907 1.077 1.907 2.185V19.5a2.25 2.25 0 0 1-2.25 2.25H6.75A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 4.5 19.5V6.257c0-1.108.806-2.057 1.907-2.185a48 48 0 0 1 1.927-.184"></path></svg></span><span class="text-xs">Copy</span></button></div></div><div class="text-left scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-slate-400 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 scrollbar-track-transparent"><pre style="background: transparent; <p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IsDisposed</code>: Indicates whether the encoder has been disposed.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Releases the resources used by the encoder.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Encode(Span&lt;float&gt; samples)</code>: Encodes the provided audio samples and writes them to the output file or stream.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="backends-miniaudio-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Backends.MiniAudio <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MiniAudioEngine</code></h3>

</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">override</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">FullDuplexDevice</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">SwitchDevice</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">FullDuplexDevice</span><span> oldDevice</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">DeviceInfo</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> newPlaybackInfo</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">DeviceInfo</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> newCaptureInfo</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">DeviceConfig</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> config </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">null</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">override</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">UpdateDevicesInfo</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> This is the concrete implementation of the abstract <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioEngine</code> class using the powerful <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">miniaudio</code> C library as its backend. It is responsible for all low-level audio I/O operations, including device discovery, initialization, and data processing callbacks. It manages the native <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">miniaudio</code> context and serves as the factory for creating <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MiniAudioDecoder</code> and <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MiniAudioEncoder</code> instances. Because it handles the native interop, this class ensures that SoundFlow is cross-platform, supporting Windows, macOS, Linux, Android, and iOS.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">InitializePlaybackDevice(...)</code>: Creates and returns a <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MiniAudioPlaybackDevice</code>, which represents an active connection to a physical sound output device.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">InitializeCaptureDevice(...)</code>: Creates and returns a <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MiniAudioCaptureDevice</code> for a physical sound input device.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">InitializeFullDuplexDevice(...)</code>: Creates and returns a <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">FullDuplexDevice</code> that manages both a playback and capture stream simultaneously.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">InitializeLoopbackDevice(...)</code>: Creates a special capture device that records the system's audio output. On Windows, this uses the WASAPI loopback feature.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CreateEncoder(...)</code>: Returns a <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MiniAudioEncoder</code> instance, currently supporting <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">.wav</code> file encoding.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CreateDecoder(...)</code>: Returns a <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MiniAudioDecoder</code> instance, capable of decoding various audio formats like <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">.wav</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">.mp3</code>, and <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">.flac</code>.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SwitchDevice(...)</code>: Implements the logic to seamlessly switch between physical audio devices at runtime, preserving the state of the audio graph.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">UpdateDevicesInfo()</code>: Communicates with the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">miniaudio</code> backend to refresh the lists of available playback and capture devices.</li>
</ul>
<hr class="shrink-0 bg-divider border-none w-full h-divider my-8" role="separator">
<h3 id="backends-miniaudio-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Backends.MiniAudio <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MiniAudioDeviceConfig</code></h3>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, &quot;Fira Code&quot;, monospace; direction: ltr; text-align: left; white-space: pre-wrap; word-spacing: normal; word-break: break-word; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 2; hyphens: none; padding: 1.5rem; margin: 0px; overflow: initial; border-radius: 0.3em; font-size: 14px; text-shadow: none;"><code><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">class</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">MiniAudioDeviceConfig</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">:</span><span> </span><span class="token type-list" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">DeviceConfig</span><span>
