</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> NoDisableDenormals </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> NoFixedSizedCallback </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">DeviceSubConfig</span><span> Playback </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">DeviceSubConfig</span><span> Capture </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">WasapiSettings</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> Wasapi </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">CoreAudioSettings</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> CoreAudio </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AlsaSettings</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> Alsa </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">PulseSettings</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> Pulse </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">OpenSlSettings</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> OpenSL </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AAudioSettings</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> AAudio </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> A detailed configuration object that inherits from <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DeviceConfig</code> and is specifically designed for initializing a MiniAudio device. It provides fine-grained control over buffer sizes, performance flags, and exposes nested configuration classes for OS-specific audio backends like WASAPI (Windows), CoreAudio (macOS), ALSA (Linux), and others. This allows developers to tune performance and behavior for specific platforms.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>General Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PeriodSizeInFrames</code>: Gets or sets the desired size of the internal processing buffer in frames (a frame is one sample for each channel). This gives precise, sample-level control over buffer latency. Takes precedence over <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PeriodSizeInMilliseconds</code>. Default is 0 (backend default).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PeriodSizeInMilliseconds</code>: Gets or sets the desired size of the internal processing buffer in milliseconds. A more intuitive way to control latency. Default is 0 (backend default).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Periods</code>: Gets or sets the number of periods to use for the device's buffer. Default is 0 (backend default).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoPreSilencedOutputBuffer</code>: If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code>, the output buffer passed to the audio callback will contain undefined data instead of being cleared to silence. This can be a minor performance optimization if you are always filling the entire buffer. Default is <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">false</code>.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoClip</code>: If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code>, the backend will not clip F32 sample values that are outside the [-1.0, 1.0] range. Default is <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">false</code>.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoDisableDenormals</code>: If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code>, the backend will not attempt to disable denormal floating-point numbers, which can slightly improve precision at the cost of performance on some CPUs. Default is <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">false</code>.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoFixedSizedCallback</code>: If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code>, the backend is not required to provide buffers of a fixed size in every callback. This can be an optimization if your processing logic is flexible. Default is <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">false</code>.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Sub-Configurations:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Playback</code>: A <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DeviceSubConfig</code> object for playback-specific settings.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Capture</code>: A <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DeviceSubConfig</code> object for capture-specific settings.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Wasapi</code>: A <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">WasapiSettings</code> object for Windows-specific settings. Only used on Windows.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CoreAudio</code>: A <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CoreAudioSettings</code> object for macOS/iOS-specific settings. Only used on Apple platforms.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Alsa</code>: An <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AlsaSettings</code> object for Linux-specific settings. Only used on Linux with ALSA.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Pulse</code>: A <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PulseSettings</code> object for Linux-specific settings. Only used on Linux with PulseAudio.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">OpenSL</code>: An <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">OpenSlSettings</code> object for Android-specific settings.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AAudio</code>: An <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AAudioSettings</code> object for modern Android-specific settings.</li>
</ul>
<hr class="shrink-0 bg-divider border-none w-full h-divider my-8" role="separator">
<h4><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DeviceSubConfig</code> (Nested Class)</h4>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Contains settings for a specific direction (playback or capture).</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ShareMode</code>: Specifies how the device is opened. <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ShareMode.Shared</code> (default) allows multiple applications to use the device. <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ShareMode.Exclusive</code> attempts to gain exclusive control for the lowest possible latency, but may not be supported by all devices.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IsLoopback</code>: (Internal) A flag used to indicate that a capture device should be initialized in loopback mode.</li>
</ul>
<hr class="shrink-0 bg-divider border-none w-full h-divider my-8" role="separator">
<h4><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">WasapiSettings</code> (Nested Class)</h4>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, &quot;Fira Code&quot;, monospace; direction: ltr; text-align: left; white-space: pre-wrap; word-spacing: normal; word-break: break-word; </span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> NoDefaultQualitySRC </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> NoAutoStreamRouting </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> NoHardwareOffloading </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Contains settings specific to the WASAPI audio backend on Windows.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Usage</code>: Hints to the OS about the stream's purpose (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Default</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Games</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProAudio</code>), which can affect system-level audio processing and prioritization.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoAutoConvertSRC</code>: If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code>, disables automatic sample rate conversion by WASAPI, letting MiniAudio handle it instead.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoDefaultQualitySRC</code>: If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code>, prevents WASAPI from using its default quality for sample rate conversion.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoAutoStreamRouting</code>: If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code>, disables automatic stream routing by the OS.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoHardwareOffloading</code>: If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code>, disables WASAPI's hardware offloading feature.</li>
</ul>
<hr class="shrink-0 bg-divider border-none w-full h-divider my-8" role="separator">

line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 2; hyphens: none; padding: 1.5rem; margin: 0px; overflow: initial; border-radius: 0.3em; font-size: 14px; text-shadow: none;"><code><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">class</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">CoreAudioSettings</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> AllowNominalSampleRateChange </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Contains settings specific to the CoreAudio backend on macOS and iOS.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AllowNominalSampleRateChange</code>: If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code>, allows the OS to change the device's sample rate to match the stream. Typically used on desktop macOS.</li>
</ul>
<hr class="shrink-0 bg-divider border-none w-full h-divider my-8" role="separator">
<h4><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AlsaSettings</code> (Nested Class)</h4>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Contains settings specific to the ALSA audio backend on Linux.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoMMap</code>: If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code>, disables memory-mapped (MMap) mode for ALSA.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoAutoFormat</code>: If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code>, prevents ALSA from performing automatic format conversion.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoAutoChannels</code>: If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code>, prevents ALSA from performing automatic channel count conversion.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoAutoResample</code>: If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code>, prevents ALSA from performing automatic resampling.</li>
</ul>
<hr class="shrink-0 bg-divider border-none w-full h-divider my-8" role="separator">

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Contains settings specific to the PulseAudio backend on Linux.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">

<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">StreamNameCapture</code>: Sets a custom name for the capture stream.</li>
</ul>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Contains settings specific to the OpenSL ES backend on Android.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">StreamType</code>: Specifies the type of audio stream (e.g., <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Voice</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Media</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Alarm</code>) to help Android manage audio focus and routing.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">RecordingPreset</code>: Optimizes the microphone input for a specific scenario (e.g., <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">VoiceCommunication</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Camcorder</code>).</li>
</ul>
<hr class="shrink-0 bg-divider border-none w-full h-divider my-8" role="separator">

</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AAudioAllowedCapturePolicy</span><span> AllowedCapturePolicy </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Contains settings specific to the modern AAudio backend on Android.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Usage</code>: Hints to the system about the stream's purpose (e.g., <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Media</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Game</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Assistant</code>) for optimized routing and resource management.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ContentType</code>: Describes the type of content being played (e.g., <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Music</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Speech</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Sonification</code>).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">InputPreset</code>: Specifies a configuration for the audio input, optimizing it for scenarios like <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">VoiceRecognition</code> or <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Camcorder</code>.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AllowedCapturePolicy</code>: Controls whether other applications are allowed to capture the audio from this stream.</li>
</ul>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AttackTime</code>: The attack time of the envelope (in seconds).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DecayTime</code>: The decay time of the envelope (in seconds).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Name</code>: The name of the envelope generator.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ReleaseTime</code>: The release time of the envelope (in seconds).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Retrigger</code>: Whether to retrigger the envelope on each new trigger.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SustainLevel</code>: The sustain level of the envelope.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Trigger</code>: The trigger mode (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoteOn</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Gate</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Trigger</code>).</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">LevelChanged</code>: Occurs when the envelope level changes.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">GenerateAudio(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer, int channels)</code>: Generates the envelope signal.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">TriggerOff()</code>: Triggers the release stage of the envelope (if in <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Gate</code> mode).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">TriggerOn()</code>: Triggers the attack stage of the envelope.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="components-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Components <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Filter</code></h3>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CutoffFrequency</code>: The cutoff frequency of the filter.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Name</code>: The name of the filter.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Resonance</code>: The resonance of the filter.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Type</code>: The filter type (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">LowPass</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">HighPass</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">BandPass</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Notch</code>).</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">GenerateAudio(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer, int channels)</code>: Applies the filter to the audio buffer.</li>
</ul>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Depth</code>: The depth of the LFO's modulation.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Mode</code>: The trigger mode (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">FreeRunning</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoteTrigger</code>).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Name</code>: The name of the LFO.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Phase</code>: The initial phase of the LFO.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Rate</code>: The rate (frequency) of the LFO.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Type</code>: The waveform type (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Sine</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Square</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Triangle</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Sawtooth</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ReverseSawtooth</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Random</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleAndHold</code>).</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">GenerateAudio(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer, int channels)</code>: Generates the LFO signal.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">GetLastOutput()</code>: Returns the last generated output sample.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Trigger()</code>: Triggers the LFO (if in <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoteTrigger</code> mode).</li>
</ul>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Components</code>: A read-only collection of sound components mixed by this mixer.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ParentDevice</code>: The playback device this mixer is the master for, if any.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IsMasterMixer</code>: A value indicating whether this is a master mixer for a device.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Name</code>: The name of the mixer.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AddComponent(SoundComponent component)</code>: Adds a component to the mixer.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">GenerateAudio(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer, int channels)</code>: Mixes the audio from all connected components.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">RemoveComponent(SoundComponent component)</code>: Removes a component from the mixer.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Disposes the mixer and all components within it.</li>
</ul>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Amplitude</code>: The amplitude of the oscillator.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Frequency</code>: The frequency of the oscillator.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Name</code>: The name of the oscillator.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Phase</code>: The initial phase of the oscillator.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PulseWidth</code>: The pulse width (for pulse waveforms).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Type</code>: The waveform type (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Sine</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Square</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Sawtooth</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Triangle</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Noise</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Pulse</code>).</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">GenerateAudio(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer, int channels)</code>: Generates the oscillator's output.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="components-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Components <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Recorder</code></h3>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Analyzers</code>: Gets a read-only collection of <see cref="AudioAnalyzer"></see> components applied to the recorder. Analyzers are used to process and extract data from the audio stream during recording.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Modifiers</code>: Gets a read-only collection of <see cref="SoundModifier"></see> components applied to the recorder. Modifiers are applied to the audio data before encoding or processing via callback, allowing for real-time audio effects during recording.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Channels</code>: The number of channels to record.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EncodingFormat</code>: The encoding format for the recorded audio.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Stream</code>: The stream to write encoded recorded audio to.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProcessCallback</code>: A callback for processing recorded audio in real time.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleRate</code>: The sample rate for recording.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">State</code>: The current recording state (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Stopped</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Playing</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Paused</code>).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleFormat</code>: The sample format for recording.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AddAnalyzer(AudioAnalyzer analyzer)</code>: Adds an <see cref="AudioAnalyzer"></see> to the recording pipeline. Analyzers process audio data during recording, enabling real-time analysis.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AddModifier(SoundModifier modifier)</code>: Adds a <see cref="SoundModifier"></see> to the recording pipeline. Modifiers apply effects to the audio data in real-time as it's being recorded.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Releases resources used by the recorder.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PauseRecording()</code>: Pauses the recording.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">RemoveAnalyzer(AudioAnalyzer analyzer)</code>: Removes a specific <see cref="AudioAnalyzer"></see> from the recording pipeline.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">RemoveModifier(SoundModifier modifier)</code>: Removes a specific <see cref="SoundModifier"></see> from the recording pipeline.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ResumeRecording()</code>: Resumes a paused recording.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">StartRecording()</code>: Starts the recording.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">StopRecording()</code>: Stops the recording.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Stops recording and releases all resources.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="components-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Components <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundPlayer</code></h3>

</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">override</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">string</span><span> Name </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(160, 161, 167); font-style: italic;">// Overrides SoundPlayerBase's default</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base">Inherits all playback functionality, properties, and events from <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundPlayerBase</code>.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Name</code>: The name of the sound player component (default: "Sound Player").</li>
</ul>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base">Inherits base playback functionality from <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundPlayerBase</code> and adds surround-specific features.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Name</code>: The name of the surround player component (default: "Surround Player").</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ListenerPosition</code>: The position of the listener in the surround sound field (Vector2).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Panning</code>: Gets or sets the panning method to use for surround sound (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Linear</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EqualPower</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">VBAP</code>).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SpeakerConfig</code>: Gets or sets the speaker configuration (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Stereo</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Quad</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Surround51</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Surround71</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Custom</code>).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">VbapParameters</code>: Gets or sets parameters for Vector Base Amplitude Panning (VBAP).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SurroundConfig</code>: Gets or sets the custom surround configuration when <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SpeakerConfig</code> is set to <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Custom</code>.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">GenerateAudio(Span&lt;float&gt; output, int channels)</code>: (Overrides <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundPlayerBase</code>) Reads audio data, applies resampling, then applies surround processing and looping if enabled.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SetSpeakerConfiguration(SpeakerConfiguration config)</code>: Sets the speaker configuration for surround sound playback.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(int sampleOffset)</code>: (Overrides <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundPlayerBase</code>) Seeks and re-initializes delay lines for surround processing.</li>
</ul>

</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> ActivationTimeMs </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> HangoverTimeMs </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> SpeechLowBand </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> SpeechHighBand </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">override</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">string</span><span> Name </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">event</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">Action</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> SpeechDetected</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">protected</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">override</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Analyze</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">Span</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span> buffer</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> channels</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Name</code>: Gets or sets the name of the voice activity detector component, useful for identification and debugging.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IsVoiceActive</code>: Read-only property indicating if voice is currently detected.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EnergyThreshold</code>: The energy threshold for detection.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ActivationTimeMs</code>: Time in milliseconds the signal must be considered speech before activation. Helps prevent short noise bursts from triggering.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">HangoverTimeMs</code>: Time in milliseconds to keep the VAD active after the last speech frame. Prevents deactivation during short pauses.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SpeechLowBand</code>/<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SpeechHighBand</code>: The frequency range (in Hz) to analyze for speech.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SpeechDetected</code>: An event that is raised whenever the voice activity state changes (i.e., when speech is detected or ceases to be detected). Listeners can subscribe to this event to respond in real-time to changes in voice activity.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">VoiceActivityDetector(int fftSize = 1024, float threshold = 0.01f, IVisualizer? visualizer = null)</code>: Constructor for the VoiceActivityDetector class. Initializes a new instance of the voice activity detector with configurable FFT size, detection threshold and optional visualizer for audio analysis visualization.
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">fftSize</code>: <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">int</code> – The size of the FFT (Fast Fourier Transform) window used for spectral analysis. Must be a power of two. Larger FFT sizes provide finer frequency resolution but may increase processing latency. Default is 1024.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">energyThreshold</code>: <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">float</code> – The sensitivity threshold for voice detection. A lower value increases sensitivity. Default is 0.01.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">visualizer</code>: <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IVisualizer?</code> – An optional visualizer instance that can be attached to the analyzer for visualizing audio processing data, useful for debugging and tuning. Default is <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">null</code>.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Analyze(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer, int channels)</code>: перевіряє audio buffer та оновлює <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IsVoiceActive</code> property на основі алгоритму детекції.
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">buffer</code>: <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Span&lt;float&gt;</code> – The audio buffer to analyze for voice activity. The audio data in this buffer is processed to determine if voice is present.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Remarks:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong>Frequency Range:</strong> The <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SpeechLowBand</code> and <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SpeechHighBand</code> properties allow you to customize the frequency range that the VAD focuses on for speech detection. Speech typically falls within the 300Hz to 3400Hz range, but you may need to adjust these values depending on the characteristics of your audio and the type of speech you are detecting.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong>Threshold Sensitivity:</strong> The <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Threshold</code> property is crucial for controlling the sensitivity of the voice activity detection. Adjusting this threshold may be necessary to achieve optimal performance in different environments and with varying audio input levels.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong>FFT Size:</strong> The <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">fftSize</code> parameter in the constructor determines the FFT window size. A larger FFT size provides better frequency resolution, which can be beneficial in noisy environments or when detecting subtle voice activity. However, it also increases the computational cost and latency. Ensure that the FFT size is always a power of 2 for optimal performance and compatibility with FFT algorithms.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong>Performance Tuning:</strong> For optimal performance, especially in real-time applications, carefully tune the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">fftSize</code> and <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Threshold</code> parameters. Larger FFT sizes are more computationally intensive but offer better frequency resolution. Adjust the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Threshold</code> based on the ambient noise level and the desired sensitivity of voice detection.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong>Environment Considerations:</strong> The ideal settings for <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">fftSize</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Threshold</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SpeechLowBand</code>, and <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SpeechHighBand</code> may vary depending on the environment in which the voice activity detector is used. In noisy environments, you might need to increase the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">fftSize</code> and adjust the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Threshold</code> to minimize false positives.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong>Visualizer for Debugging:</strong> The optional <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">visualizer</code> parameter in the constructor is highly useful for debugging and tuning the voice activity detector. By attaching a visualizer, you can visually inspect the audio data and the detector's response, which can help in understanding and adjusting the detector's parameters for optimal performance in your specific use case.</li>
</ul>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Values:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Playback</code>: Indicates playback capability.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Record</code>: Indicates recording capability.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Mixed</code>: Indicates both playback and recording capability.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Loopback</code>: Indicates loopback capability (recording system audio output).</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="enums-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Enums <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DeviceType</code></h3>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; <p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Values:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">

<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Capture</code>: Device used for audio capture.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="enums-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Enums <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EncodingFormat</code></h3>

<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">S32</code>: Signed 32-bit integer.</li>

</ul>

</ul>
<h3 id="enums-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Enums <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EnvelopeGenerator.TriggerMode</code></h3>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span>
</span><span>    NoteOn</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span>
</span><span>    Gate</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span>
</span>    Trigger
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Values:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoteOn</code>: The envelope will go directly from attack to sustain, without a decay stage.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Gate</code>: The envelope will progress normally, and will only enter release stage when trigger is off.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Trigger</code>: The envelope will always progress to the end, including the release stage.</li>
</ul>

<h3 id="enums-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Enums <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">LowFrequencyOscillator.TriggerMode</code></h3>
