</span><span>    FreeRunning</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span>
</span>    NoteTrigger
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Values:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">FreeRunning</code>: The LFO will run continuously without needing a trigger.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoteTrigger</code>: The LFO will only start when triggered.</li>
</ul>

<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Quad</code>: Quadraphonic configuration (4 speakers).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Surround51</code>: 5.1 surround sound configuration (6 speakers).</li>

<li class="leading-relaxed">
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Custom</code>: A custom speaker configuration defined by the user.</li>
</ul>
</li>
</ul>

<h3 id="editing-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Editing <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Composition</code></h3>

<h3 id="editing-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Editing <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Track</code></h3>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base">See <a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="./editing-engine.mdx#track" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link">Editing and Persistence Guide</a> for details.</p>

<h3 id="editing-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Editing <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioSegment</code></h3>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base">See <a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="./editing-engine.mdx#audiosegment" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link">Editing and Persistence Guide</a> for details.</p>

<h3 id="editing-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Editing <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioSegmentSettings</code></h3>

<h3 id="editing-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Editing <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">TrackSettings</code></h3>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base">See <a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="./editing-engine.mdx#tracksettings" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link">Editing and Persistence Guide</a> for details.</p>

<h3 id="editing-persistence" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Editing.Persistence</h3>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base">These are Data Transfer Objects (DTOs) for serialization. See <a class="relative inline-flex items-center tap-highlight-transparent outline-none data-[focus-visible=true]:z-10 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-2 data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-focus data-[focus-visible=true]:outline-offset-2 text-medium hover:opacity-hover active:opacity-disabled transition-opacity text-primary hover:text-primary-600 font-medium underline decoration-primary underline-offset-2" href="./editing-engine.mdx#project-persistence" tabindex="0" data-react-aria-pressable="true" role="link">Editing and Persistence Guide</a> for their purpose.</p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CompositionProjectManager</code> (static class): <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SaveProjectAsync</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">LoadProjectAsync</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">RelinkMissingMediaAsync</code>.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProjectData</code></li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProjectTrack</code></li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProjectSegment</code></li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProjectAudioSegmentSettings</code></li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProjectTrackSettings</code></li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProjectSourceReference</code></li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProjectEffectData</code></li>
</ul>
<h3 id="extensions-webrtc-apm" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Extensions.WebRtc.Apm</h3>
<h4><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioProcessingModule</code> (Class)</h4>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Provides low-level access to the WebRTC Audio Processing Module. It's responsible for initializing the APM, applying configurations, and processing audio frames. Generally used internally by <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">WebRtcApmModifier</code> and <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoiseSuppressor</code>.</p>
<h4><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ApmConfig</code> (Class)</h4>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Used to configure the features of the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioProcessingModule</code> such as echo cancellation, noise suppression, gain control, etc.</p>

</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> NumChannels </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Dispose</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Defines the properties (sample rate, number of channels) of an audio stream being processed by the APM.</p>
<h4><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProcessingConfig</code> (Class)</h4>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base">This class holds multiple <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">StreamConfig</code> instances for different parts of the APM pipeline (input, output, reverse input, reverse output).</p>

</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Dispose</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> A component for offline/batch noise suppression using WebRTC APM. It takes an <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundDataProvider</code>, processes its audio, and outputs the cleaned audio either as a whole or in chunks.
<strong>Key Members:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoiseSuppressor(ISoundDataProvider dataProvider, int sampleRate, int numChannels, ...)</code>: Constructor.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">OnAudioChunkProcessed</code> (event): Raised when a chunk of audio is processed.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProcessAll()</code>: Processes the entire audio stream and returns it.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProcessChunks()</code>: Processes audio in chunks, raising <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">OnAudioChunkProcessed</code>.</li>
</ul>

<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">override</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Process</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">Span</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span> buffer</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">override</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">ProcessSample</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> sample</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> channel</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(160, 161, 167); font-style: italic;">// Throws NotSupportedException</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Dispose</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> A <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SoundModifier</code> that applies various WebRTC APM features (AEC, NS, AGC, HPF, PreAmp) to an audio stream in real-time.
<strong>Key Members:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed">Constructor with detailed initial settings.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed">Properties for configuring each APM feature (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EchoCancellation</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoiseSuppression</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AutomaticGainControl</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProcessingPipeline</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">HighPassFilterEnabled</code>, etc.).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Process(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer)</code>: Core processing logic.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Releases native APM resources.</li>
</ul>
<h4>Enums for WebRTC APM</h4>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ApmError</code>: Error codes.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NoiseSuppressionLevel</code>: Low, Moderate, High, VeryHigh.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">GainControlMode</code>: AdaptiveAnalog, AdaptiveDigital, FixedDigital.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DownmixMethod</code>: AverageChannels, UseFirstChannel.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">RuntimeSettingType</code>: Types for runtime APM settings.</li>
</ul>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Position</code>: The current read position within the audio data (in samples).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Length</code>: The total length of the audio data (in samples).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CanSeek</code>: Indicates whether seeking is supported.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleFormat</code>: The format of the audio samples.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleRate</code>: The sample rate of the audio data.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EndOfStreamReached</code>: Raised when the end of the audio data is reached.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PositionChanged</code>: Raised when the read position changes.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ReadBytes(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer)</code>: Reads audio samples into the provided buffer.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(int offset)</code>: Seeks to the specified offset (in samples) within the audio data.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Releases resources held by the data provider.</li>
</ul>

</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Decode</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">Span</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span> samples</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Seek</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> offset</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IsDisposed</code>: Indicates whether the decoder has been disposed.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Length</code>: The total length of the decoded audio data (in samples).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleFormat</code>: The sample format of the decoded audio data.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Channels</code>: The number of channels in the decoded audio data.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleRate</code>: The sample rate of the decoded audio data.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EndOfStreamReached</code>: Raised when the end of the audio stream is reached during decoding.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Decode(Span&lt;float&gt; samples)</code>: Decodes a portion of the audio stream into the provided buffer.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(int offset)</code>: Seeks to the specified offset (in samples) within the audio stream.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Releases the resources used by the decoder.</li>
</ul>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">State</code>: The current playback state (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Stopped</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Playing</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Paused</code>).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IsLooping</code>: Whether looping is enabled or disabled (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">get</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">set</code>).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PlaybackSpeed</code>: Gets or sets the playback speed. 1.0 is normal speed.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Volume</code>: Gets or sets the volume of the sound player (0.0 to 1.0 or higher for gain).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Time</code>: The current playback position (in seconds).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Duration</code>: The total duration of the audio (in seconds).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">LoopStartSeconds</code>: Gets the configured loop start point in seconds.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">LoopEndSeconds</code>: Gets the configured loop end point in seconds.  -1 indicates looping to the natural end.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">LoopStartSamples</code>: Gets the configured loop start point in samples.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">LoopEndSamples</code>: Gets the configured loop end point in samples. -1 indicates looping to the natural end.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Play()</code>: Starts or resumes playback.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Pause()</code>: Pauses playback.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Stop()</code>: Stops playback and resets the position to the beginning.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(TimeSpan time, SeekOrigin seekOrigin = SeekOrigin.Begin)</code>: Seeks to the specified time using <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">TimeSpan</code>. Returns <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code> if successful.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(float time)</code>: Seeks to the specified time (in seconds). Returns <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code> if successful.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(int sampleOffset)</code>: Seeks to the specified sample offset (in samples). Returns <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code> if successful.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SetLoopPoints(float startTime, float? endTime = -1f)</code>: Configures custom loop points using start and end times in seconds. <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">endTime</code> is optional;  use -1 or <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">null</code> to loop to the natural end.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SetLoopPoints(int startSample, int endSample = -1)</code>: Configures custom loop points using start and end sample indices. <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">endSample</code> is optional; use -1 to loop to the natural end.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SetLoopPoints(TimeSpan startTime, TimeSpan? endTime = null)</code>: Configures custom loop points using <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">TimeSpan</code>.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="interfaces-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Interfaces <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IVisualizationContext</code></h3>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Clear()</code>: Clears the drawing surface.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DrawLine(float x1, float y1, float x2, float y2, Color color, float thickness = 1f)</code>: Draws a line from (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">x1</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">y1</code>) to (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">x2</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">y2</code>) with the specified color and thickness.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DrawRectangle(float x, float y, float width, float height, Color color)</code>: Draws a rectangle with the specified position, dimensions, and color.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="interfaces-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Interfaces <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IVisualizer</code></h3>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><div class="flex items-center justify-between px-4 py-3 rounded-t-xl border-b border-slate-300/70 bg-slate-100/70 dark:border-b-white/5 dark:bg-black/20"><div class="flex items-center gap-4"><span class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">Csharp</span></div><div class="flex items-center gap-2"><button class="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-1.5 rounded-md transition-all duration-300 text-gray-600 bg-black/5 hover:bg-blue-500/10 hover:text-blue-700 hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-blue-500/10 dark:text-gray-300 dark:bg-white/5 dark:hover:bg-purple-500/20 dark:hover:text-white dark:hover:shadow-lg dark:hover:shadow-purple-500/20" aria-label="Copy code"><span style="opacity: 1; </span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Name</code>: The name of the visualizer.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">VisualizationUpdated</code>: Raised when the visualization needs to be updated.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProcessOnAudioData(Span&lt;float&gt; audioData)</code>: Processes a chunk of audio data for visualization.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Render(IVisualizationContext context)</code>: Renders the visualization using the provided <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IVisualizationContext</code>.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Releases the resources used by the visualizer.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="modifiers-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Modifiers <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AlgorithmicReverbModifier</code></h3>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; <span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">override</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">ProcessSample</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> sample</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> channel</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> An algorithmic reverb modifier based on the Freeverb algorithm. Now supports multi-channel audio, applying distinct delay lines and modulation to create a wider spatial effect.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Constructor:</strong> <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AlgorithmicReverbModifier(AudioFormat format)</code>: Initializes the modifier for the specified audio format.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Damp</code>: The damping factor of the reverb.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Name</code>: The name of the modifier.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PreDelay</code>: The pre-delay time (in milliseconds).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">RoomSize</code>: The simulated room size.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Wet</code>: The wet/dry mix of the reverb (0 = dry, 1 = wet).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Width</code>: The stereo width of the reverb.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Mix</code>: The mix level of the reverb.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProcessSample(float sample, int channel)</code>: Processes a single audio sample and applies the reverb effect.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="modifiers-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Modifiers <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">BassBoostModifier</code></h3>

<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">override</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">ProcessSample</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> sample</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> channel</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Cutoff</code>: The cutoff frequency below which the bass boost is applied.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">BoostGain</code>: The gain applied to the bass boost in dB.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">

</ul>
<h3 id="modifiers-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Modifiers <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ChorusModifier</code></h3>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DepthMs</code>: The depth of the chorus effect.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">RateHz</code>: The rate of the chorus effect.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Feedback</code>: The feedback amount of the chorus effect.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">WetDryMix</code>: The wet/dry mix of the chorus effect.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">maxDelayMs</code>: The maximum delay length (in samples) used by the chorus effect.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">

</ul>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ThresholdDb</code>: The threshold (in dB) above which compression is applied.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Ratio</code>: The compression ratio.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AttackMs</code>: The attack time (in milliseconds).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ReleaseMs</code>: The release time (in milliseconds).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">KneeDb</code>: The knee width (in dB).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MakeupGainDb</code>: The amount of makeup gain to apply after compression.</li>
</ul>

<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">

</ul>
<h3 id="modifiers-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Modifiers <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DelayModifier</code></h3>

</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">DelayModifier</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> delayLength</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> feedback</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> wetMix</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> cutoffFrequency</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>

<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">override</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">ProcessSample</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> sample</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> channel</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">delayLength</code>: The delay length (in samples).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">feedback</code>: The feedback amount of the delay.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">wetMix</code>: The wet/dry mix of the delay (0 = dry, 1 = wet).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">cutoffFrequency</code>: The cutoff frequency for the low-pass filter applied to the delayed signal.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProcessSample(float sample, int channel)</code>: Processes a single audio sample and applies the delay effect.</li>
</ul>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Name</code>: The name of the modifier.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AddBand(EqualizerBand band)</code>: Adds an <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EqualizerBand</code> to the equalizer.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AddBand(FilterType filterType, float frequency, float gain, float q, float bandwidth)</code>: Adds an equalizer band with the specified parameters.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AddBands(IEnumerable&lt;EqualizerBand&gt; bands)</code>: Adds multiple equalizer bands.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ClearBands()</code>: Removes all equalizer bands.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Process(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer)</code>: Processes an entire buffer of audio, applying equalization.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProcessSample(float sample, int channel)</code>: This method throws a <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NotSupportedException</code> because <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ParametricEqualizer</code> operates on buffers, not individual samples.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">RemoveBand(EqualizerBand band)</code>: Removes a specific equalizer band.</li>
</ul>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> A sound modifier that implements a multi-channel chorus effect, allowing for different chorus parameters (depth, rate, feedback) for each audio channel. This is useful for creating rich, spatial chorus effects.</p>
<h3 id="modifiers-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Modifiers <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">TrebleBoostModifier</code></h3>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CutoffFrequency</code>: The cutoff frequency above which the treble boost is applied.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ProcessSample(float sample, int channel)</code>: Processes a single audio sample and applies the treble boost effect.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="providers-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Providers <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AssetDataProvider</code></h3>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CanSeek</code>: Indicates whether seeking is supported (always true for <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AssetDataProvider</code>).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Length</code>: The total length of the audio data (in samples).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Position</code>: The current read position within the audio data (in samples).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleRate</code>: The sample rate of the audio data.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleFormat</code>: The format of the audio samples.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PositionChanged</code>: Raised when the read position changes.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EndOfStreamReached</code>: Raised when the end of the audio data is reached.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Releases the resources used by the provider.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ReadBytes(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer)</code>: Reads audio samples into the provided buffer.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(int sampleOffset)</code>: Seeks to the specified offset (in samples) within the audio data.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="providers-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Providers <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">StreamDataProvider</code></h3>

<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">ReadBytes</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">Span</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span> buffer</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Seek</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> sampleOffset</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Dispose</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CanSeek</code>: Indicates whether seeking is supported (depends on the underlying stream).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Length</code>: The total length of the audio data (in samples).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Position</code>: The current read position within the audio data (in samples).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleRate</code>: The sample rate of the audio data.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleFormat</code>: The format of the audio samples.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PositionChanged</code>: Raised when the read position changes.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EndOfStreamReached</code>: Raised when the end of the audio stream is reached.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ReadBytes(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer)</code>: Reads audio samples from the stream into the provided buffer.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(int sampleOffset)</code>: Seeks to the specified offset (in samples) within the audio stream (if supported).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Releases resources used by the provider.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="providers-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Providers <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MicrophoneDataProvider</code></h3>

</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> CanSeek </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">SampleFormat</span><span> SampleFormat </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>

</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">event</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">EventHandler</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">EventArgs</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> EndOfStreamReached</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">event</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">EventHandler</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">PositionChangedEventArgs</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> PositionChanged</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">StartCapture</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">StopCapture</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>    
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">ReadBytes</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">Span</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span> buffer</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Seek</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> offset</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Dispose</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Position</code>: The current read position within the captured audio data (in samples).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Length</code>: Returns -1, indicating an unknown length for the live microphone stream.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CanSeek</code>: Returns <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">false</code> because seeking is not supported for live microphone input.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleFormat</code>: The sample format of the captured audio data, which matches the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioEngine</code>'s sample format.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleRate</code>: The sample rate of the captured audio data.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EndOfStreamReached</code>: Raised when <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">StopCapture()</code> is called, signaling the end of the microphone input stream.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PositionChanged</code>: Raised after reading data, indicating that the read position has changed.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MicrophoneDataProvider(int bufferSize = 8, int? sampleRate = null)</code>: Constructor that initializes the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MicrophoneDataProvider</code>. It sets the buffer queue size (default is 8), the sample rate (defaults to the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioEngine</code>'s sample rate), and subscribes to the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioEngine.OnAudioProcessed</code> event to capture audio data.
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">bufferSize</code>: The number of audio sample arrays to hold in internal queue. Higher values will lead to higher latency but will be more resilient to performance spikes.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">sampleRate</code>: The sample rate of the microphone, will use the audioEngine sample rate if not set.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">StartCapture()</code>: Starts capturing audio data from the microphone.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">StopCapture()</code>: Stops capturing audio data and raises the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EndOfStreamReached</code> event.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ReadBytes(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer)</code>: Reads captured audio samples into the provided buffer. If not enough data is available in the queue it will fill the rest of the buffer with silence.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(int offset)</code>: Throws <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NotSupportedException</code> because seeking is not supported for live microphone input.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Releases resources used by the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MicrophoneDataProvider</code>, unsubscribes from the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioEngine.OnAudioProcessed</code> event, and clears the internal buffer queue.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="providers-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Providers <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ChunkedDataProvider</code></h3>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><div class="flex items-center justify-between px-4 py-3 rounded-t-xl border-b border-slate-300/70 bg-slate-100/70 dark:border-b-white/5 dark:bg-black/20"><div class="flex items-center gap-4"><span class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">Csharp</span></div><div class="flex items-center gap-2"><button class="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-1.5 rounded-md transition-all duration-300 text-gray-600 bg-black/5 hover:bg-blue-500/10 hover:text-blue-700 hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-blue-500/10 dark:text-gray-300 dark:bg-white/5 dark:hover:bg-purple-500/20 dark:hover:text-white dark:hover:shadow-lg dark:hover:shadow-purple-500/20" aria-label="Copy code"><span style="opacity: 1; </span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">SampleFormat</span><span> SampleFormat </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>

</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">event</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">EventHandler</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">EventArgs</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> EndOfStreamReached</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
