</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Position</code>: The current read position within the audio data (in samples).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Length</code>: The total length of the audio data in samples.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CanSeek</code>: Indicates whether seeking is supported (depends on the underlying stream).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleFormat</code>: The format of the audio samples.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleRate</code>: The sample rate of the audio data.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EndOfStreamReached</code>: Raised when the end of the audio stream is reached.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PositionChanged</code>: Raised when the read position changes.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ChunkedDataProvider(Stream stream, int? sampleRate = null, int chunkSize = DefaultChunkSize)</code>: Constructor that initializes the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ChunkedDataProvider</code> with a <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Stream</code>. It creates an <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundDecoder</code> to decode the stream, sets the default chunk size (220500 samples per channel, which is 10 seconds at 44.1 kHz), and starts prefetching data.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ChunkedDataProvider(string filePath, int? sampleRate = null, int chunkSize = DefaultChunkSize)</code>: Constructor that initializes the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ChunkedDataProvider</code> with a file path. It opens a <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">FileStream</code> and calls the other constructor.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ReadBytes(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer)</code>: Reads audio samples into the provided buffer. It reads data from an internal buffer that is prefilled with decoded audio. If the buffer runs out, it decodes another chunk from the stream.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(int sampleOffset)</code>: Seeks to the specified sample offset within the audio data (if supported by the stream and decoder). It disposes of the current decoder, creates a new one, and seeks within the stream. Then, it clears the internal buffer and refills it from the new position.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Releases the resources used by the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ChunkedDataProvider</code>, including the decoder and the stream.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Remarks:</strong></p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base">The <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ChunkedDataProvider</code> is designed to handle large audio files efficiently by reading and decoding them in chunks. This prevents the entire file from being loaded into memory at once. The default chunk size is set to 10 seconds of audio at 44.1 kHz, but you can adjust this value in the constructor. The class uses an internal buffer (<code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Queue&lt;float&gt;</code>) to store decoded audio samples and prefetches data in the background.</p>
<h3 id="providers-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Providers <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">QueueDataProvider</code></h3>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><div class="flex items-center justify-between px-4 py-3 rounded-t-xl border-b border-slate-300/70 bg-slate-100/70 dark:border-b-white/5 dark:bg-black/20"><div class="flex items-center gap-4"><span class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">Csharp</span></div><div class="flex items-center gap-2"><button class="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-1.5 rounded-md transition-all duration-300 text-gray-600 bg-black/5 hover:bg-blue-500/10 hover:text-blue-700 hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-blue-500/10 dark:text-gray-300 dark:bg-white/5 dark:hover:bg-purple-500/20 dark:hover:text-white dark:hover:shadow-lg dark:hover:shadow-purple-500/20" aria-label="Copy code"><span style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" aria-hidden="true" role="img" class="iconify iconify--heroicons w-4 h-4" width="1em" height="1em" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M15.666 3.888A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 13.5 2.25h-3c-1.03 0-1.9.693-2.166 1.638m7.332 0q.083.292.084.612v0a.75.75 0 0 1-.75.75H9a.75.75 0 0 1-.75-.75v0q.002-.32.084-.612m7.332 0q.969.073 1.927.184c1.1.128 1.907 1.077 1.907 2.185V19.5a2.25 2.25 0 0 1-2.25 2.25H6.75A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 4.5 19.5V6.257c0-1.108.806-2.057 1.907-2.185a48 48 0 0 1 1.927-.184"></path></svg></span><span class="text-xs">Copy</span></button></div></div><div class="text-left scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-slate-400 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 scrollbar-track-transparent"><pre style="background: transparent; color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, &quot;Fira Code&quot;, monospace; direction: ltr; text-align: left; white-space: pre-wrap; word-spacing: normal; word-break: break-word; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 2; hyphens: none; padding: 1.5rem; margin: 0px; overflow: initial; border-radius: 0.3em; font-size: 14px; text-shadow: none;"><code><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">enum</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">QueueFullBehavior</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(160, 161, 167); font-style: italic;">/// </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-style: italic;">&lt;</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(228, 86, 73); font-style: italic;">summary</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-style: italic;">&gt;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(160, 161, 167); font-style: italic;">///     Throw an </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-style: italic;">&lt;</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(228, 86, 73); font-style: italic;">see</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(228, 86, 73); font-style: italic;"> </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1); font-style: italic;">cref</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(80, 161, 79); font-style: italic;">=</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(80, 161, 79); font-style: italic;">"</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(80, 161, 79); font-style: italic;">InvalidOperationException</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(80, 161, 79); font-style: italic;">"</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-style: italic;">/&gt;</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(160, 161, 167); font-style: italic;"> when the queue is full. This is the default behavior.</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(160, 161, 167); font-style: italic;">/// </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-style: italic;">&lt;/</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(228, 86, 73); font-style: italic;">summary</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-style: italic;">&gt;</span><span>
</span><span>    Throw</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(160, 161, 167); font-style: italic;">/// </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-style: italic;">&lt;</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(228, 86, 73); font-style: italic;">summary</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-style: italic;">&gt;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(160, 161, 167); font-style: italic;">///     Block the calling thread until space becomes available in the queue.</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(160, 161, 167); font-style: italic;">/// </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-style: italic;">&lt;/</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(228, 86, 73); font-style: italic;">summary</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-style: italic;">&gt;</span><span>
</span><span>    Block</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(160, 161, 167); font-style: italic;">/// </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-style: italic;">&lt;</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(228, 86, 73); font-style: italic;">summary</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-style: italic;">&gt;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(160, 161, 167); font-style: italic;">///     Silently drop the incoming samples and return immediately.</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(160, 161, 167); font-style: italic;">/// </span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-style: italic;">&lt;/</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(228, 86, 73); font-style: italic;">summary</span><span class="token doc-comment" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-style: italic;">&gt;</span><span>
</span>    Drop
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span>
<span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">class</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">QueueDataProvider</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">:</span><span> </span><span class="token type-list" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">ISoundDataProvider</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">QueueDataProvider</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioFormat</span><span> format</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> maxSamples </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">=</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">null</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">QueueFullBehavior</span><span> fullBehavior </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">=</span><span> QueueFullBehavior</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">.</span><span>Throw</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> SamplesAvailable </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">long</span><span> TotalSamplesEnqueued </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> IsDisposed </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> Position </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> Length </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> CanSeek </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">SampleFormat</span><span> SampleFormat </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> SampleRate </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">event</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">EventHandler</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">EventArgs</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> EndOfStreamReached</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">event</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">EventHandler</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">PositionChangedEventArgs</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> PositionChanged</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">AddSamples</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">ReadOnlySpan</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span> samples</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Reset</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">CompleteAdding</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">ReadBytes</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">Span</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span> buffer</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Seek</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> sampleOffset</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Dispose</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Provides audio data from an in-memory queue that is fed samples externally. This provider is ideal for scenarios where audio data is generated or received in chunks. It supports configurable behavior for when the queue becomes full, specified by the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">QueueFullBehavior</code> enum.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Position</code>: The current read position within the audio data (in samples).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Length</code>: Always returns -1, indicating the total length is unknown as it's a dynamic queue.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CanSeek</code>: Always returns <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">false</code>, as seeking is not supported by this provider.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleFormat</code>: The format of the audio samples.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleRate</code>: The sample rate of the audio data.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SamplesAvailable</code>: Gets the number of samples currently available in the queue.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">TotalSamplesEnqueued</code>: Gets the total number of samples that have been enqueued into the provider since its creation or last reset.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">IsDisposed</code>: Gets a value indicating whether the provider has been disposed.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EndOfStreamReached</code>: Raised when the end of the audio stream is reached, which occurs when <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CompleteAdding()</code> has been called and all samples have been read from the queue.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PositionChanged</code>: Raised when the read position changes.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AddSamples(ReadOnlySpan&lt;float&gt; samples)</code>: Adds audio samples to the internal queue. The behavior when the queue is full is determined by the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">QueueFullBehavior</code> set during construction:</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed">If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">QueueFullBehavior.Throw</code> (default), an <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">InvalidOperationException</code> is thrown if adding samples would exceed the maximum size.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed">If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">QueueFullBehavior.Block</code>, the calling thread will block until space becomes available in the queue for the entire block of samples.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed">If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">QueueFullBehavior.Drop</code>, the incoming samples are silently discarded.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed">Throws <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">InvalidOperationException</code> if called after <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CompleteAdding()</code> has been invoked.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Reset()</code>: Resets the provider to its initial state, clearing the sample queue, resetting the position, and allowing samples to be added again. Any threads previously blocked in <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AddSamples</code> (if <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">QueueFullBehavior.Block</code> was active) will be unblocked.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CompleteAdding()</code>: Marks that no more samples will be added to the queue. Once called, subsequent calls to <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AddSamples</code> will throw an <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">InvalidOperationException</code>. The <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EndOfStreamReached</code> event will be raised when all remaining samples in the queue have been read.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ReadBytes(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer)</code>: Reads audio samples from the internal queue into the provided buffer. Returns the number of samples read. If the queue is empty, it returns 0. If <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CompleteAdding()</code> has been called and the queue becomes empty, the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EndOfStreamReached</code> event will be fired.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(int sampleOffset)</code>: Throws an <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">InvalidOperationException</code> because seeking is not supported by this queue-based provider.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Releases the resources used by the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">QueueDataProvider</code>, clears the sample queue, and unblocks any waiting threads.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="providers-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Providers <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NetworkDataProvider</code></h3>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, &quot;Fira Code&quot;, monospace; direction: ltr; text-align: left; white-space: pre-wrap; word-spacing: normal; word-break: break-word; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 2; hyphens: none; padding: 1.5rem; margin: 0px; overflow: initial; border-radius: 0.3em; font-size: 14px; text-shadow: none;"><code><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">sealed</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">class</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">NetworkDataProvider</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">:</span><span> </span><span class="token type-list" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">ISoundDataProvider</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">NetworkDataProvider</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioEngine</span><span> engine</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioFormat</span><span> format</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">string</span><span> url</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> Position </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> Length </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">private</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> CanSeek </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">private</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">SampleFormat</span><span> SampleFormat </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">private</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> SampleRate </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">set</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">event</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">EventHandler</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">EventArgs</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> EndOfStreamReached</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">event</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">EventHandler</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">PositionChangedEventArgs</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">?</span><span> PositionChanged</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">ReadBytes</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">Span</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span> buffer</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Seek</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> sampleOffset</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Dispose</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Position</code>: The current read position within the audio data (in samples).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Length</code>: The total length of the audio data (in samples). Returns -1 for HLS streams without an <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">#EXT-X-ENDLIST</code> tag, indicating an unknown or continuously growing length.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CanSeek</code>: Indicates whether seeking is supported. It's <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">true</code> for direct audio URLs if the server supports range requests and for HLS streams with an <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">#EXT-X-ENDLIST</code> tag; otherwise, it's <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">false</code>.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleFormat</code>: The format of the audio samples. Determined after the initial connection to the stream.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleRate</code>: The sample rate of the audio data.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Events:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EndOfStreamReached</code>: Raised when the end of the audio stream is reached.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PositionChanged</code>: Raised when the read position changes.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NetworkDataProvider(string url, int? sampleRate = null)</code>: Constructor that initializes the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NetworkDataProvider</code> with a network URL. It determines whether the URL points to a direct audio file or an HLS playlist.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ReadBytes(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer)</code>: Reads audio samples into the provided buffer. It reads data from an internal buffer that is filled asynchronously.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(int sampleOffset)</code>: Seeks to the specified sample offset within the audio data (if supported). The behavior differs for direct URLs and HLS streams:
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong>Direct URLs:</strong> Performs an HTTP range request to fetch data starting from the desired offset.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><strong>HLS Streams:</strong> Locates the HLS segment containing the desired time offset and starts downloading from that segment.</li>
</ul>
</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Releases the resources used by the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NetworkDataProvider</code>, including the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">HttpClient</code>, decoder, and stream.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Remarks:</strong></p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base">The <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NetworkDataProvider</code> can handle both direct audio URLs and HLS (HTTP Live Streaming) playlists. It automatically detects the stream type and behaves accordingly.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Direct Audio URLs:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed">It uses <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">HttpClient</code> to make requests to the URL.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed">It supports seeking if the server responds with an "Accept-Ranges: bytes" header.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed">It creates an <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ISoundDecoder</code> to decode the audio stream.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed">It buffers audio data asynchronously in a background thread.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>HLS Playlists:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed">It downloads and parses the M3U(8) playlist file.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed">It identifies the individual media segments (e.g., <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">.ts</code> files).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed">It downloads and decodes segments sequentially.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed">It refreshes the playlist periodically for live streams.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed">It supports seeking by selecting the appropriate segment based on the desired time offset.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed">It determines whether the playlist has a defined end by checking for the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">#EXT-X-ENDLIST</code> tag, which affects whether <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Length</code> is known and <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CanSeek</code> is true.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base">The class uses an internal <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Queue&lt;float&gt;</code> to buffer audio samples. The <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ReadBytes</code> method waits for data to become available in the buffer if it's empty.</p>
<h3 id="providers-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Providers <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">RawDataProvider</code></h3>

<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">ReadBytes</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">Span</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&lt;</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">&gt;</span><span> buffer</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Seek</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> offset</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">void</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">Dispose</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Provides audio data from a stream containing raw PCM audio data.
<strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Position</code>: The current read position in samples.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Length</code>: The total length of the stream in samples.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CanSeek</code>: Indicates if the underlying stream is seekable.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleFormat</code>: The sample format of the raw audio data.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleRate</code>: The sample rate of the raw audio data.
<strong>Events:</strong></li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">EndOfStreamReached</code>: Raised when the end of the stream is reached.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">PositionChanged</code>: Raised when the read position changes.
<strong>Methods:</strong></li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ReadBytes(Span&lt;float&gt; buffer)</code>: Reads raw PCM data from the stream and converts it to <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">float</code> if necessary.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Seek(int offset)</code>: Seeks to the specified offset in the underlying stream if <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">CanSeek</code> is true.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dispose()</code>: Disposes the underlying stream.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="structs" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Structs</h3>
<h3 id="object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">AudioFormat</code></h3>

color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, &quot;Fira Code&quot;, monospace; direction: ltr; text-align: left; white-space: pre-wrap; word-spacing: normal; word-break: break-word; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 2; hyphens: none; padding: 1.5rem; margin: 0px; overflow: initial; border-radius: 0.3em; font-size: 14px; text-shadow: none;"><code><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">record</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">struct</span><span> AudioFormat
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">SampleFormat</span><span> Format</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> Channels</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">int</span><span> SampleRate</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token return-type" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">float</span><span> InverseSampleRate </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">get</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span><span>
</span>
<span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">static</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">readonly</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioFormat</span><span> Cd</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">static</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">readonly</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioFormat</span><span> Dvd</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">static</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">readonly</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioFormat</span><span> DvdHq</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">static</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">readonly</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioFormat</span><span> Studio</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">static</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">readonly</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioFormat</span><span> StudioHq</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">static</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">readonly</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioFormat</span><span> Broadcast</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">static</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">readonly</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">AudioFormat</span><span> Telephony</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> A record struct representing the format of an audio stream, including sample format, channel count, and sample rate. It is a value type and provides several common presets.</p>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Fields:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Format</code>: The sample format (e.g., <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleFormat.S16</code>, <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleFormat.F32</code>).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Channels</code>: The number of audio channels (e.g., 1 for mono, 2 for stereo).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">SampleRate</code>: The sample rate in Hertz (e.g., 44100, 48000).</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Properties:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">InverseSampleRate</code>: Gets the inverse of the sample rate, useful for calculations involving sample duration.</li>
</ul>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Static Presets:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Cd</code>: Standard Compact Disc (CD) audio format (S16, 2 Channels, 44100 Hz).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Dvd</code>: Standard DVD-Video audio format (S16, 2 Channels, 48000 Hz).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DvdHq</code>: High-quality DVD-Video audio format (F32, 2 Channels, 48000 Hz).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Studio</code>: Common studio recording format (S24, 2 Channels, 96000 Hz).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">StudioHq</code>: High-quality studio recording format (F32, 2 Channels, 96000 Hz).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Broadcast</code>: Standard broadcast audio format (S16, 1 Channel, 48000 Hz).</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Telephony</code>: Telephony and VoIP audio format (U8, 1 Channel, 8000 Hz).</li>
</ul>
<h4><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DeviceInfo</code></h4>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><div class="flex items-center justify-between px-4 py-3 rounded-t-xl border-b border-slate-300/70 bg-slate-100/70 dark:border-b-white/5 dark:bg-black/20"><div class="flex items-center gap-4"><span class="text-sm font-medium text-gray-700 dark:text-gray-300">Csharp</span></div><div class="flex items-center gap-2"><button class="flex items-center gap-2 px-3 py-1.5 rounded-md transition-all duration-300 text-gray-600 bg-black/5 hover:bg-blue-500/10 hover:text-blue-700 hover:shadow-lg hover:shadow-blue-500/10 dark:text-gray-300 dark:bg-white/5 dark:hover:bg-purple-500/20 dark:hover:text-white dark:hover:shadow-lg dark:hover:shadow-purple-500/20" aria-label="Copy code"><span style="opacity: 1; transform: none;"><svg xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink" aria-hidden="true" role="img" class="iconify iconify--heroicons w-4 h-4" width="1em" height="1em" viewBox="0 0 24 24"><path fill="none" stroke="currentColor" stroke-linecap="round" stroke-linejoin="round" stroke-width="1.5" d="M15.666 3.888A2.25 2.25 0 0 0 13.5 2.25h-3c-1.03 0-1.9.693-2.166 1.638m7.332 0q.083.292.084.612v0a.75.75 0 0 1-.75.75H9a.75.75 0 0 1-.75-.75v0q.002-.32.084-.612m7.332 0q.969.073 1.927.184c1.1.128 1.907 1.077 1.907 2.185V19.5a2.25 2.25 0 0 1-2.25 2.25H6.75A2.25 2.25 0 0 1 4.5 19.5V6.257c0-1.108.806-2.057 1.907-2.185a48 48 0 0 1 1.927-.184"></path></svg></span><span class="text-xs">Copy</span></button></div></div><div class="text-left scrollbar-thin scrollbar-thumb-slate-400 dark:scrollbar-thumb-white/20 scrollbar-track-transparent"><pre style="background: transparent; color: rgb(56, 58, 66); font-family: &quot;JetBrains Mono&quot;, &quot;Fira Code&quot;, monospace; direction: ltr; text-align: left; white-space: pre-wrap; word-spacing: normal; word-break: break-word; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 2; hyphens: none; padding: 1.5rem; margin: 0px; overflow: initial; border-radius: 0.3em; font-size: 14px; text-shadow: none;"><code><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">[</span><span class="token attribute" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">StructLayout</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments">LayoutKind</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">.</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments">Sequential</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments"> CharSet </span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">=</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments"> CharSet</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">.</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments">Ansi</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">]</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">struct</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">DeviceInfo</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">{</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">IntPtr</span><span> Id</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">[</span><span class="token attribute" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">MarshalAs</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments">UnmanagedType</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">.</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments">ByValTStr</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments"> SizeConst </span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">=</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments"> </span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">256</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">]</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">string</span><span> Name</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">[</span><span class="token attribute" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">MarshalAs</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments">UnmanagedType</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">.</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments">U1</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">]</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">bool</span><span> IsDefault</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">uint</span><span> NativeDataFormatCount</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>
</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">IntPtr</span><span> NativeDataFormats</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(160, 161, 167); font-style: italic;">// Pointer to an array of NativeDataFormat</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Represents information about an audio device, including its native ID, name, whether it's the default system device, and a count/pointer to its supported native data formats.</p>
<h4><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NativeDataFormat</code></h4>
<div class="overflow-x-auto mb-6"><div class="group my-8"><div class="aurora-background relative rounded-xl backdrop-blur-sm bg-slate-200 border border-slate-300 shadow-xl shadow-slate-900/15 dark:bg-black/20 dark:border-white/10 dark:shadow-2xl dark:shadow-purple-900/20" style="opacity: 1; line-height: 1.5; tab-size: 2; hyphens: none; padding: 1.5rem; margin: 0px; overflow: initial; border-radius: 0.3em; font-size: 14px; text-shadow: none;"><code><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">[</span><span class="token attribute" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">StructLayout</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">(</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments">LayoutKind</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">.</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments">Sequential</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">,</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments"> CharSet </span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(64, 120, 242);">=</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments"> CharSet</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">.</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments">Ansi</span><span class="token attribute attribute-arguments" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">)</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">]</span><span>
</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">struct</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">NativeDataFormat</span><span>

</span><span>    </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(166, 38, 164);">public</span><span> </span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(183, 107, 1);">SampleFormat</span><span> Format</span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">;</span><span>

</span><span></span><span class="token" style="color: rgb(56, 58, 66);">}</span></code></pre></div></div></div></div>
<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Description:</strong> Represents a specific native data format (sample format, channels, sample rate) supported by an audio device. Accessed via the <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">NativeDataFormats</code> pointer in <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">DeviceInfo</code>.</p>
<h3 id="utils-object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24">Utils <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">Extensions</code></h3>

<p class="text-foreground leading-relaxed text-base"><strong>Methods:</strong></p>
<ul class="list-disc ml-6 mb-6 space-y-2 text-foreground">
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">GetBytesPerSample(this SampleFormat sampleFormat)</code>: Returns the number of bytes per sample for a given sample format.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">GetSpan&lt;T&gt;(nint ptr, int length)</code>: Creates a span of type <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">T</code> from a native memory pointer.</li>
<li class="leading-relaxed"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">ReadArray&lt;T&gt;(this nint pointer, int count) where T : struct</code>: Reads an array of structures of type <code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">T</code> from a native memory pointer.</li>
</ul>
<h3 id="object-object" class="text-2xl font-semibold text-foreground mb-4 mt-8 first:mt-0 scroll-mt-24"><code class="h-fit font-normal inline-block whitespace-nowrap bg-content2 text-foreground px-1.5 py-0.5 rounded-md font-mono text-sm">MathHelper</code></h3>
